description: This file defines a React component 'Header' that renders the top navigation bar of a web application. It includes navigation links, a theme toggle button, and user authentication controls (sign in/out, profile link). It also contains a subcomponent 'ThemeToggle' for toggling between light and dark themes.

methods.name: ThemeToggle()
methods.description: A React functional component that provides a button to toggle the theme between light and dark modes.

methods.name: Header()
methods.description: Main React functional component that renders the header/navigation bar including links, user controls, and theme toggle.
